pub.devrel.easygoogle.gac

Interface AppInvites.AppInviteListener

  • Enclosing class:
    AppInvites

    public static interface AppInvites.AppInviteListener
    Listener to be notified of asynchronous App Invite events, like invitation receipt or sending success.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onInvitationReceived(java.lang.String invitationId, java.lang.String deepLink)
      Called when the application has received an App Invite, either while running or through a Play Store install.
      void onInvitationsFailed()
      Sending invitations failed or the user canceled the operation.
      void onInvitationsSent(java.lang.String[] ids)
      The user has successfully invited one or more contacts.

    • Method Detail

      • onInvitationReceived

        void onInvitationReceived(java.lang.String invitationId,
                        java.lang.String deepLink)
        Called when the application has received an App Invite, either while running or through a Play Store install. Before this callback is invoked, the invitation will be marked as completed through the App Invites API.
        Parameters:
        invitationId - the unique ID of the invitation.
        deepLink - the deep link data sent with the invitation,

      • onInvitationsSent

        void onInvitationsSent(java.lang.String[] ids)
        The user has successfully invited one or more contacts.
        Parameters:
        ids - an array of unique IDs, one for each invitation sent by the user. The same id will be given to the recepient upon invitation receipt.

      • onInvitationsFailed

        void onInvitationsFailed()
        Sending invitations failed or the user canceled the operation.
